query: Generate a global datacenter UPS forecast aggregating all regions (China, USA, Europe, Rest_of_World) through 2030. Show regional contributions and validate that global totals match the sum of regional demands
expected_behavior: Step 1: Runs forecasts for China, USA, Europe, Rest_of_World individually
Step 2: Aggregates regional results to create global totals
Step 3: Validates mass balance at global level
Step 4: Generates both regional breakdowns and global summary
Creates separate CSV files for each region plus global aggregate
Generates JSON output containing regional_results and global_result sections
Global total demand equals sum of regional demands (within 1% tolerance)
Shows regional heterogeneity in tipping points: China ~2027, USA ~2028, Europe ~2029, RoW ~2030
Demonstrates that China dominates early Li-ion adoption (cost advantage)
USA and Europe follow with 1-2 year lag (moderate costs)
Rest_of_World has slowest transition (higher financing costs)
Global weighted average tipping point around 2028
By 2040: Global Li-ion share 80-85%, with regional variance 75-92%
Total global demand reaches ~40-50 GWh/year by 2040
China represents ~40% of global demand, USA ~25%, Europe ~20%, RoW ~15%
Validates no double-counting in regional aggregation
Shows installed base reconciliation at both regional and global levels
